languages.text: Судно было опознано как "Дарованное озарение" — торговый когг, реквизированный стаей Зловещий вой на Футфоле. На борту не обнаружили следов боя или иных несчастий, лишь некоторое количество полезных грузов в трюме. Вопреки ожиданиям не были найдены и члены экипажа — живые либо мертвые. Корабль был брошен, и топливные системы пришли в негодность — застывший прометий разорвал баки и трубы.

The ship is identified as the Revelation Granted, the merchant cog commandeered by the Baleful Howl on Footfall. No signs of struggle or other misfortune are found aboard, only some useful cargo in the hold. Contrary to expectations, no crew members are found, dead or alive. The ship has been abandoned, and its fuel systems are non-functional — the promethium has frozen solid and ruptured the tanks and pipes.
languages.original_text: Судно было опознано как "Дарованное озарение" — торговый когг, реквизированный стаей Зловещий вой на Футфоле. На борту не обнаружили следов боя или иных несчастий, лишь некоторое количество полезных грузов в трюме. Вопреки ожиданиям не были найдены и члены экипажа — живые либо мертвые. Корабль был брошен, и топливные системы пришли в негодность — застывший прометий разорвал баки и трубы.

The ship is identified as the Revelation Granted, the merchant cog commandeered by the Baleful Howl on Footfall. No signs of struggle or other misfortune are found aboard, only some useful cargo in the hold. Contrary to expectations, no crew members are found, dead or alive. The ship has been abandoned, and its fuel systems are non-functional — the promethium has frozen solid and ruptured the tanks and pipes.

languages.text: 调查结果表明，这艘名为“神圣启示号”的舰船，正是怒嚎者在落脚港征用的那艘商船。船上并没有打斗或其他事故的迹象，只有一部分有用的补给放在船舱里。出人意料的是，船上没有任何船员，也没有任何尸体。这艘船已经被遗弃了，钷素已经被冻住了，油箱和管道也被冻裂了，燃料系统已经无法使用。
languages.original_text: The ship is identified as the Revelation Granted, the merchant cog commandeered by the Baleful Howl on Footfall. No signs of struggle or other misfortune are found aboard, only some useful cargo in the hold. Contrary to expectations, no crew members are found, dead or alive. The ship has been abandoned, and its fuel systems are non-functional — the promethium has frozen solid and ruptured the tanks and pipes.

traits.locale_text: 调查结果表明，这艘名为“神圣启示号”的舰船，正是渴名者在落脚港征用的那艘商船。船上并没有打斗或其他事故的迹象，只有一部分有用的补给放在船舱里。出人意料的是，船上没有任何船员，也没有任何尸体。这艘船已经被遗弃了，钷素已经被冻住了，油箱和管道也被冻裂了，燃料系统已经无法使用。

languages.text: この船はリベレイション・グランテッドだと判明する。フットフォールで破滅の咆哮に乗っ取られた商用船だ。争いやその他の不幸が起きた痕跡はなく、役立つ積み荷が貨物室に残るだけだ。予想に反して、生死にかかわらず船員の姿は一人も見つからない。この船は放棄されており、燃料システムは機能しない。プロメチウムが凍って固形と化し、タンクと配管が破裂しているためだ。
languages.original_text: The ship is identified as the Revelation Granted, the merchant cog commandeered by the Baleful Howl on Footfall. No signs of struggle or other misfortune are found aboard, only some useful cargo in the hold. Contrary to expectations, no crew members are found, dead or alive. The ship has been abandoned, and its fuel systems are non-functional — the promethium has frozen solid and ruptured the tanks and pipes.

traits.locale_text: この船はリベレイション・グランテッドだと判明する。フットフォールで誉れある飢えに乗っ取られた商用船だ。争いやその他の不幸が起きた痕跡はなく、役立つ積み荷が貨物室に残るだけだ。予想に反して、生死にかかわらず船員の姿は一人も見つからない。この船は放棄されており、燃料システムは機能しない。プロメチウムが凍って固形と化し、タンクと配管が破裂しているためだ。

languages.text: Se trataba en realidad de la Revelación Concedida, la nave mercante que tomaron los integrantes del Aullido Torvo en Paso. No se encuentran señales de motines u otras refriegas a bordo, solo ciertos productos de utilidad en la bodega. A pesar de lo que pudiera perecer, no se da con ningún miembro de la tripulación, ya fuera vivo o muerto. La nave había sido abandonada y sus sistemas de combustible quedaron inoperativos, debido a la congelación del prometio que contenía y la consiguiente ruptura de sus tanques y tuberías.
languages.original_text: The ship is identified as the Revelation Granted, the merchant cog commandeered by the Baleful Howl on Footfall. No signs of struggle or other misfortune are found aboard, only some useful cargo in the hold. Contrary to expectations, no crew members are found, dead or alive. The ship has been abandoned, and its fuel systems are non-functional — the promethium has frozen solid and ruptured the tanks and pipes.

traits.locale_text: Se trataba en realidad de la Revelación Concedida, la nave mercante que tomaron los Hambrientos de Fama en Paso. No se encuentran señales de motines u otras refriegas a bordo, solo ciertos productos de utilidad en la bodega. A pesar de lo que pudiera perecer, no se da con ningún miembro de la tripulación, ya fuera vivo o muerto. La nave había sido abandonada y sus sistemas de combustible quedaron inoperativos, debido a la congelación del prometio que contenía y la consiguiente ruptura de sus tanques y tuberías.

languages.text: Votre examen révèle qu'il s'agit du Révélation Accordée, un vaisseau marchand réquisitionné par les Hurleurs sanguinaires à Castel. Il ne présente ni signe de lutte ni autre problème particulier, et sa soute ne contient qu'une cargaison utilitaire. Contre toute attente, aucun membre d'équipage n'est retrouvé mort ou vivant. Le vaisseau a été abandonné et ses systèmes d'alimentation en carburant sont hors d'usage : le prométhium a gelé, provoquant du même coup la rupture des réservoirs et des conduits.
languages.original_text: The ship is identified as the Revelation Granted, the merchant cog commandeered by the Baleful Howl on Footfall. No signs of struggle or other misfortune are found aboard, only some useful cargo in the hold. Contrary to expectations, no crew members are found, dead or alive. The ship has been abandoned, and its fuel systems are non-functional — the promethium has frozen solid and ruptured the tanks and pipes.

traits.locale_text: Votre examen révèle qu'il s'agit du Révélation Accordée, un vaisseau marchand réquisitionné par les Dévoreurs de gloire à Castel. Il ne présente ni signe de lutte ni autre problème particulier, et sa soute ne contient qu'une cargaison utilitaire. Contre toute attente, aucun membre d'équipage n'est retrouvé mort ou vivant. Le vaisseau a été abandonné et ses systèmes d'alimentation en carburant sont hors d'usage : le prométhium a gelé, provoquant du même coup la rupture des réservoirs et des conduits.

languages.text: Das Schiff ist die Revelation Granted, die Handelskogge, die die Baleful Howl auf Footfall gekapert haben. An Bord wurden keinerlei Anzeichen eines Kampfs oder anderen Unglücks gefunden, nur etwas nützliche Fracht. Unerwarteterweise waren keine Crewmitglieder an Bord, weder lebendig noch tot. Das Schiff wurde aufgegeben, seine Treibstoffsysteme sind defekt — das Promethium ist eingefroren und hat die Tanks und Leitungen platzen lassen.
languages.original_text: The ship is identified as the Revelation Granted, the merchant cog commandeered by the Baleful Howl on Footfall. No signs of struggle or other misfortune are found aboard, only some useful cargo in the hold. Contrary to expectations, no crew members are found, dead or alive. The ship has been abandoned, and its fuel systems are non-functional — the promethium has frozen solid and ruptured the tanks and pipes.

traits.locale_text: Das Schiff wird als Revelation Granted identifiziert, die Handelskogge unter dem Kommando der Famehungry auf Footfall. An Bord gibt es keine Kampfspuren oder Hinweise auf andere Unglücksfälle, nur etwas nützliche Fracht. Entgegen der Erwartungen werden keine Crewmitglieder gefunden, weder tot noch lebendig. Das Schiff wurde verlassen, und die Treibstoffsysteme sind nicht einsatzbereit – das Promethium ist eingefroren und hat die Tanks und Rohre zum Platzen gebracht.

languages.text: Geminin; İnen Vahiy adındaki, Binliman'da Uğursuz Uluma tarafından komuta edilen bir tüccar gemisi olduğu belirleniyor. Hiçbir çatışma veya kaza izine rastlanmıyor, sadece ambarda bir miktar işe yarar kargo bulunuyor. Beklentilerin aksine ölü ya da diri hiç mürettebat bulunmuyor. Gemi terk edilmiş, yakıt sistemleri çalışmıyor; donan prometyum, tanklarla boruları delmiş.
languages.original_text: The ship is identified as the Revelation Granted, the merchant cog commandeered by the Baleful Howl on Footfall. No signs of struggle or other misfortune are found aboard, only some useful cargo in the hold. Contrary to expectations, no crew members are found, dead or alive. The ship has been abandoned, and its fuel systems are non-functional — the promethium has frozen solid and ruptured the tanks and pipes.

traits.locale_text: Vahiy Verildi adındaki gemi, Binliman'da Uğursuz Uluma tarafından komuta edilen bir tüccar gemisiydi. Herhangi bir çatışma veya kaza izine rastlanmadı, sadece ambarda bir miktar işe yarar kargo duruyordu. Beklentilerin aksine ölü ya da diri hiç mürettebat bulunmadı. Gemi terk edilmiş ve yakıt sistemleri çalışmıyordu. Prometyum donmuş ve tanklarla boruları delmişti.
